subject: Brake load cell
description_text:
Hello,

I think I have an issue with the load cell of my braking pedal. I ordered a Simsonn PRO X P3-H1 pedal in December 2024. Order number: 23215169900102004
I can fully push the brake pedal with my hand and reach 100% on Simsonn manager, I think it's impossible to do that on a 200kg loadcell. Is it a defective load cell?
Can I get an estimate for a brake upgrade kit pedal only for the braking pedal + a haptic kit included VAM Pro, power supply and if needed control box.

Best regards.

conversations.body_text: Hi Fred Gourd, Please use a toothpick or screwdriver to press and hold the small button inside the hole on the side of the control box, then reconnect the USB cable. The software should enter recovery mode. Next, go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Pedals → Firmware → Pedals → plusX.sfu and try updating the firmware manually. If the issue persists, we recommend installing Todesk (no registration required). Simply provide your ID and temporary access code, and we can schedule a time to assist you remotely.

Hi,

Thanks for your answer, I did and it's better but a little smooth.
I saw a YouTube video which explained that you have to tighten the hex wrench under the pedal to make it harder.
What do you think about that?

Best regards.
________________________________
From: support@simsonn.com

Hi Fred Gourd, We couldn’t find your order in our system, so it’s possible that you didn’t purchase it from our official AliExpress store. Please send us photos of your pedal and control box so we can confirm the model. If you’re using the ProX pedals, we offer an upgrade kit that can improve the damping and hydraulic feel. Additionally, there are internal screws inside the base sensor that allow for fine-tuning the sensor’s travel range. If you're referring to the 8-level adjustable hydraulic rod strength, then yes — this upgrade kit includes a softer version, designed for users who prefer a lighter pedal feel. https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-x-ultra-pedals-upgrade-kit

Hi, thanks for your answer.

I ordered it on Alibaba, N# 232151699001020047, date 2024-11-25 10:02:49
Screenshot in attachment.
Do you sell upgrade kit without hydraulics, because I have it on the brake and no need for throttle and clutch.

I have another issue with the LED on the throttle. I'll send you pictures of that later, I'm not at home.

Best regards
